title: The Dead Beat
author: Johnstone, Doug
snippet: The walls of the Royal Dick were covered in bleached animal bones and medical instruments, the pub having been converted from the old veterinary school along with Summerhall next door. Martha sat with Billy and Cal, swigging her Erdinger and imagining animal ghosts haunting the room.

title: The Dead Beat
author: Johnstone, Doug
snippet: Martha had explained to V about Ian back in the Royal Dick.
